name: Levelogger Software Data File
summary: A LEV file is a data file created by Levelogger Software, a program used to view groundwater and surface water data recorded by Levelogger Edge devices. It contains data recorded during a logging session, which includes groundwater and surface water level and temperature measurements. LEV files were used by versions 1 to 3 of Levelogger Software as the default file format but were replaced by .XLE files with the release of version 4 of Levelogger Software.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
